description: Tooting Works is a vibrant community asset which supports local people, businesses and organisations across London to thrive. Home to over 100 organisations, we provide affordable space in the heart of Tooting, alongside a variety of vibrant community spaces. The profits from Tooting Works go straight into our on-site youth charity Business Launchpad that supports young entrepreneurs to flourish.

factsheet.heading: AwardWinning social enterprise in the heart of Tooting
paragraphs: We are a Black female-led social enterprise located in the heart of Tooting, dedicated to supporting over 100 local businesses and providing a vibrant community hub for everyone.

Since the pandemic, our building has undergone significant transformations, adapting to the new work landscape to better enable connection and collaboration. Our commitment to fostering a supportive and inclusive environment remains steadfast, as we continue to innovate and create opportunities for local entrepreneurs and community members alike.

Our onsite youth charity combats unemployment, incubates the next generation of young entrepreneurs and provides support to those aged 8-30. In June we were awarded the Innovation Award at The Wandsworth Business Awards and commended for Best Charity.
Through our guided tour and talk, meet the architect who designed the community hub and the Community Impact Manager who generates social impact and community cohesion.

travel_info: Additional travel info: We will start and finish at the bright yellow entrance gates.

name: Tooting Works
